description: Complete system overview documenting the LIMS microservice architecture, key components, and their interactions. Includes high-level overview of core services like sample management, RAG processing, and storage optimization.

Comprehensive documentation of all laboratory-specific data models including samples, submissions, storage locations, workflows, and their relationships. Details schema definitions, validation rules, and state transitions.
Detailed documentation of the RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) algorithms, including document processing, information extraction, confidence scoring, and laboratory-specific query handling logic.
Documentation of storage optimization algorithms including capacity prediction, temperature zone management, AI-driven placement strategies, and digital twin simulation models.
Details the implementation of laboratory workflows including multi-agent coordination, quality control processes, MLOps experiment tracking, and continuous learning pipelines.
Comprehensive documentation of data flows between microservices, including sample submission processing, storage management, RAG pipeline integration, and system monitoring.
